definitions.text: an abstraction belonging to or characteristic of two entities or parts together
the act of sexual procreation between a man and a woman; the man's penis is inserted into the woman's vagina and excited until orgasm and ejaculation occur
a person related by blood or marriage
examples: police are searching for relatives of the deceased
he has distant relations back in New Jersey
he was the hero according to his own relation
his endless recounting of the incident eventually became unbearable

definitions.text: (law) the principle that an act done at a later time is deemed by law to have occurred at an earlier time
examples: his attorney argued for the relation back of the amended complaint to the time the initial complaint was filed

definitions.text: (usually plural) mutual dealings or connections among persons or groups
